T02D2684:226a-1: badzra bid'a ra na n'a mdh'a ra ni britti /
T02D2684:226a-3: rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi 'grel pa /
T02D2684:226a-4: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2684:226a-5: rdo rje lta bu'i ye shes kyis //
T02D2684:226a-6: gdul dka' rnams kyi gnyen po gang //
T02D2684:226a-7: mchog tu zab pa'i chos nyid can //
T02D2684:226a-9: re zhig yongs su shes par bya ba pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa dang /
T02D2684:226a-10: rjes su bsgrub par bya ba sngags kyi theg pa gnyis so //
T02D2684:226a-11: sngags la yang rdo rje 'chang gis bka' stsal ba'i rgyud dang /
T02D2684:226a-12: de dang mi 'gal ba'i bla ma dam pa'i gdams ngag go //
T02D2684:226a-13: rgyud la rnam par gzhag pa dang //
T02D2684:226a-14: bshad pa'i tshul gyis rtogs par bya ste /
T02D2684:226a-15: re zhig spyi rgyud kyi rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T02D2684:226a-16: gang zhig rgyun chags pa de'i rgyud de'o //
T02D2684:226a-18: rgyud ni rgyun chags zhes bya ste /
T02D2684:226a-20: mya ngan las 'das rgyud phyi ma //
T02D2684:226a-23: ma tshang med dang 'brel ba dang //
T02D2684:226a-24: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don yang de bzhin du rig par bya'o //
T02D2684:226a-25: de lta bu'i rgyud de la yang gdul bya'i khyad
T02D2684:226a-26: par dang brjod bya don gyi khyad par gyis rnam
T02D2684:226a-27: pa bzhi'o // de yang gang zhe na /
T02D2684:226a-28: bya ba dang spyod pa dang /
T02D2684:226a-29: rnal 'byor bla na med pa'i rgyud do //
T02D2684:226a-30: gzhan dag rgyud gong ma'i lta ba ston cing 'og
T02D2684:226a-31: ma'i spyod pa ston pa gnyis ka'i rgyud dang lnga'o
T02D2684:226a-33: de lta na rgyud la la nas rgyud phal cher
T02D2684:226b-0: gyi don @226b tshang bar gsungs pa yang yod pas
T02D2684:226b-1: rgyud sde lnga las kyang lhag par 'gyur te /
T02D2684:226b-2: nyes pa 'di yang spang bar dka'o //
T02D2684:226b-3: de'i phyir rgyud de ni bzhi kho na'o //
T02D2684:226b-4: 'dir ni bya ba'i rgyud ston pa'i skabs yin pas de brjod par bya ste /
T02D2684:226b-5: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i gtsug tor las 'od zer
T02D2684:226b-6: dang bcas pa'i khro bo zhig byung ste zhus pa
T02D2684:226b-7: la bshad pa ni gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba'i
T02D2684:226b-8: rgyud ces bya'o // de bzhin du zhal khro bo me lce 'bar ba dang /
T02D2684:226b-13: zhabs kyi bol gong la sogs pa nas sprul pa'i zhu ba po la gsang ba'i spyi rgyud dang /
T02D2684:226b-14: dpung pa bzang po la sogs pa'i rgyud rnams bshad do //
T02D2684:226b-15: de dag thams cad kyi don zab mo mdor bsdus
T02D2684:226b-16: te lag na rdo rje la gsungs pa ni rdo
T02D2684:226b-18: le lag gi rgyud dam man ngag gi rgyud ces kyang bya'o //
T02D2684:226b-19: de ltar na mdor bsdus te rgyud kyi rnam par gzhag pa'i bshad pa'o //
T02D2684:226b-20: de nas rgyud kyi bshad pa'i tshul brjod par bya'o //
T02D2684:226b-21: de la phun sum tshogs pa rnam pa lnga ste /
T02D2684:226b-27: de la ston pa ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o //
T02D2684:226b-28: gnas ni chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang ngo //
T02D2684:226b-29: dus ni 'dzam bu'i gling du chos kyis 'khor lo
T02D2684:226b-30: gsum gsungs ba'i rjes la'am bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i
T02D2684:226b-31: dus su'o // chos ni rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la sogs pa'i rgyud rnams so //
T02D2684:226b-32: 'khor ni sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la sogs pa'o //
T02D2684:226b-33: de ltan rgyun bshad pa'i tshul lo //
T02D2684:226b-34: da ni gzhung gi don la 'jug par bya ste /
T02D2684:226b-35: de yang gnyis te drang ba'i don dang nges pa'i don yi ge ltar bshad pa dang /
T02D2684:226b-36: gdams ngag gi don phyi dang /
T02D2684:226b-37: nang dang gsang ba dang de kho na nyid kyi dbye bas khrus bzhi bstan pa'o //
T02D2684:226b-38: de la re zhig yi ge'i don brjod par bya ste /
T02D2684:226b-39: de la yang dang por nges pa'i don brjod par bya'i /
T02D2684:226b-40: yi ge'i don brjod pa ni sgra ji bzhin du 'og nas brjod par bya'o //
T02D2684:226b-41: nges pa'i don du sbyar na chos thams cad kyi
T02D2684:226b-42: de bzhin nyid la bsgyur zhing bcos su mi yi
T02D2684:226b-43: ge'i don brjod par bya ste /
T02D2684:226b-44: de la yang dang por nges pa'i pa'i don du 'di skad ces bya ba gsungs so //
T02D2684:227a-0: yang dag par ni chos thams cad de bzhin nyid las ma g-yos shing @227a * //
T02D2684:227a-1: de kho na nyid yin pas na bdag gis zhes bya'o //
T02D2684:227a-2: 'o na de bzhin nyid la kha dog dang dbyibs
T02D2684:227a-3: la sogs pa'i rang bzhin med pas ji ltar rtogs
T02D2684:227a-4: par rung snyam pa la de'i phyir /
T02D2684:227a-5: bla ma'i drin gyis rtogs par 'gyur //
T02D2684:227a-6: zhes gsungs pa ni thos pa zhes bya'o /
T02D2684:227a-7: de yang dpe la sogs pa'i sgo nas bla mas
T02D2684:227a-8: mtshon pa las rim gyis nges par skye bar 'gyur
T02D2684:227a-9: gyi cig car du rang gi ngo bor thos pa'am
T02D2684:227a-11: de lta bu'i bla ma dam pa rnyed dka' zhing
T02D2684:227a-12: des rjes su bzung yang de kho na nyid myur
T02D2684:227a-13: du rtogs par dka' ste rim gyis sbyangs pa la
T02D2684:227a-14: sna ma zhig rtogs par 'gyur bas na dus gcig
T02D2684:227a-16: gang gis de ltar rtogs pa'i don de la ni
T02D2684:227a-17: grub pa'i mtha' zhe'am lta ba zhes kyang zer ro
T02D2684:227a-18: // de ltar rtogs pa'i don la gnas te 'dris
T02D2684:227a-19: shing goms par byed pa ni bsgom pa zhes bya
T02D2684:227a-20: ba'am rnal 'byor zhes kyang zer ro //
T02D2684:227a-21: de lta bu'i bstan pa dang gong nas gong du
T02D2684:227a-22: phogs dbyung ba'i gnas skabs la ni sa dang lam
T02D2684:227a-23: gyi rim pa zhes zer ro //
T02D2684:227a-24: de rab tu gsal zhing khyad par du gyur pa'i
T02D2684:227a-25: gnas skabs na sgrub pa po de la byang chub
T02D2684:227a-27: de yang nyon mongs pa'i sems kyis mi 'jug cing
T02D2684:227a-28: rang gis nyams su myong ba la gnod pa'i las
T02D2684:227a-29: mi byed pa ni spyod pa zhes bya'o //
T02D2684:227a-30: de ltar na lta ba dang //
T02D2684:227a-33: de dang mi 'gal ba'i las spyod pa ste de
T02D2684:227a-34: dag dang ldan pa ni brtson 'grus kyi khyad par
T02D2684:227a-35: gyi skye ba gcig gam gnyis la sogs pa ci
T02D2684:227a-36: rigs par rang 'dod pa'i 'bras bu 'thob par gyur
T02D2684:227a-37: pas 'bras bu bstan pa ni bcom ldan 'das gsungs
T02D2684:227a-38: te / de ni thob par 'dod pa'i phyir 'bras bu'o //
T02D2684:227a-39: gnas skabs kyi 'bras bu'i drang ba'i don brjod pa'i skabs su brjod par bya'o //
T02D2684:227a-40: de la bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni phyin
T02D2684:227a-41: ci log 'joms pa'i skal ba can te bha ga
T02D2684:227a-42: zhes bya ba'i don ni skal ba'am 'joms pa yin
T02D2684:227a-43: pa'i phyir ro // gang 'joms she na bdud bzhi
T02D2684:227a-44: 'joms pa ste skye ba ni phung po lnga mngon
T02D2684:227a-45: par len pas na phung po'i bdud do //
T02D2684:227a-46: rgas pa ni legs pa las nyams pas na lha'i bu'i bdud do //
T02D2684:227a-47: na pa ni bde bas phongs shing nyon mongs pas na nyon mongs pa'i bdud do //
T02D2684:227b-0: 'chi @227b ba ni nyid mtshams sbyor bar 'gyur ba ste 'chi bdag gi bdud do //
T02D2684:227b-1: bdud de rnams gang las byung zhe na /
T02D2684:227b-2: nyon mongs pas bskul ba las byung ba'o //
T02D2684:227b-3: de yang gang las byung zhe na bag chags dang
T02D2684:227b-4: bcas pa'i sems las byung bas na sems de ni
T02D2684:227b-5: nyes pa thams cad 'byung ba'i rtsa bar gyur bas
T02D2684:227b-6: / rgyud do cog gi rtsa ba ste //
T02D2684:227b-8: gzhan yang de legs bar rtogs shing sems de'i rang
T02D2684:227b-9: bzhin khong du goms pas bdag dang gzhan la phan
T02D2684:227b-10: pa dang bde ba thams cad kyang de la 'byung
T02D2684:227b-11: bas de'i phyir / rgyud do cog gi rtsa ba ste //
T02D2684:227b-13: rgyud thams cad du yang don 'di rtogs pa'i thabs
T02D2684:227b-14: gzhan dang gzhan gsungs bar zad kyi don gyi gtso
T02D2684:227b-15: bo ni 'di nyid yin pa'i phyir yang /
T02D2684:227b-16: rgyud do cog gis rtsa ba ste //
T02D2684:227b-18: de lta bas na gzhom zhing gdul bar bya ba ni rang gi sems yin te /
T02D2684:227b-19: ma bcos na nyes pa'i rgyud do cog yin la /
T02D2684:227b-20: bcos pa ni legs pa'i dpal kun thob par byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2684:227b-21: 'o na gang gis gzhom zhe na /
T02D2684:227b-26: ji ltar gzhom pa ni rtogs pa'i don rjes su bsgrub pa mthar phyir pas so //
T02D2684:227b-27: gang gzhom pa ni bdud bzhi la sogs pa'i rgyud do cog gi rtsa ba'o //
T02D2684:227b-28: gang gis bcom pa ni dbang gi rim pa dang mthun pa'i khrus kyis so //
T02D2684:227b-29: de ltar bcom pas dpal kun gyis ni legs par brgyan pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
T02D2684:227b-30: de gang gis bcom pa la rnam par rtog pa
T02D2684:227b-31: med cing gang la yang mi gnas pa zhes bya'o
T02D2684:227b-32: // rdo rje la bzhugs zhes bya ba ni spangs
T02D2684:227b-33: pa dang ye shes phun sum tshogs pa'i ngo bo
T02D2684:227b-34: nyid las mi 'gyur zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go
T02D2684:227b-35: // // de'i che ba'i rang bzhin dang yon tan
T02D2684:227b-36: ni 'og nas mi chod pa zhes bya ba la
T02D2684:227b-38: de'i don ni 'di skad du bstan par 'gyur te /
T02D2684:227b-39: gang gi bla ma la brten te de kho na
T02D2684:227b-40: nyid rtogs pa mngon du byas pa'i 'bras bu ni
T02D2684:227b-41: dbyings dang ye shes dbyer med pa las smin pa'i
T02D2684:227b-42: tshul du don mdzad cing bzhugs so zhes rig par
T02D2684:227b-43: bya'o // de'i yang bcom ldan 'das zhes bya bas
T02D2684:227b-44: ni chad pa'i mtha' bsal te rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
T02D2684:227b-45: la zag pa med pa'i rang bzhin can bde ba
T02D2684:228a-1: ye shes mnga' bar bstan to //
T02D2684:228a-2: rdo rje la bzhugs zhes bya bas ni rtag pa'i mtha' bsal te /
T02D2684:228a-3: chos kyi dbyings ston ba nyid bstan pa'o //
T02D2684:228a-4: de ltar chos kyi dbyings stong pa nyid dang ye
T02D2684:228a-5: shes rtog ba med par mar la mar zhugs pa'am
T02D2684:228a-6: / chu la chu thim pa lta bur gyur pa ste de la chos kyi sku zhes kyang bya /
T02D2684:228a-7: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes kyang bya /
T02D2684:228a-9: byang chub chen po zhes kyang bya'o //
T02D2684:228a-10: sangs rgyas kyi mthu zhes bya ba la sangs rgyas ni 'das ma thag par bshad pa nyid do //
T02D2684:228a-11: mthu ni cho 'phrul te nam mkha'i cho 'phrul sprin la sogs pa sna tshogs 'byung ba lta bu'o ;
T02D2684:228a-12: / gang la nang du don mi g-yeng ba'i yang
T02D2684:228a-13: lag tu phyag tu de mtshon byed kyi phyag mtshan
T02D2684:228a-14: bsnams pa la de skad dku ba rjod de lag
T02D2684:228a-15: na rdo rje'ang nang gi stong pa'i ngang la mi
T02D2684:228a-16: yengs pa'i brjed byang du rdo rje lag tu thogs
T02D2684:228a-18: rnam par smin pa las grub pa las grub ba
T02D2684:228a-19: dang ting nge 'dzin gyi lus la ni lus thams
T02D2684:228a-21: rdo rje byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba ni stong
T02D2684:228a-22: pa nyid sgom pa'i snod du rung bar byas shing
T02D2684:228a-23: stong pa nyid kyis gdams ngag gnang ba'o //
T02D2684:228a-24: rdo rje ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so
T02D2684:228a-25: zhes bya ba ni lag na rdo rjes gdams ba
T02D2684:228a-26: de lhur blangs te sgrub cing gnas ba'o /
T02D2684:228a-28: gdams pa gang zhe na stong pa nyid dang ldan ba'i khrus bzhi'o //
T02D2684:228a-29: de dag ni yi ge'i don nges pa'i don du mdor bsdus te bkod pa'o //
T02D2684:228a-30: da ni gdams ngag gi don brjod par bya'o //
T02D2684:228a-32: gzungs sngags kyi tshul zlos pa'i phyi'i khrus dang /
T02D2684:228a-33: rig sngags kyi tshul du zlos pa nang gi khrus dang /
T02D2684:228a-34: gsang sngags su zlos pa gsang ba'i khrus dang /
T02D2684:228a-35: snying bor zlos ba de kho na nyid kyi khrus so //
T02D2684:228a-36: khrus de dag kyang rim pa bzhin du nyan thos dang /
T02D2684:228a-39: dbu ma pa rnams la sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D2684:228a-40: de la dang por phyi'i khrus kyis ni lus dag par byed la ;
T02D2684:228a-41: nang gi khrus kyis ni ngag dag par byed cing gsang ba'i khrus kyis ni sems dag par byed /
T02D2684:228a-42: de kho na nyid kyi khrus rdo rje lta bu'i
T02D2684:228a-43: ting nge 'dzin gyis ni lus ngag yid gsum dbyer
T02D2684:228a-45: da ni phyi'i khrus bya bar 'dod pa rnams la de bshad par bya ste /
T02D2684:228b-0: dang por sngags pa snying @228b rje che zhing bya
T02D2684:228b-1: ba la mkhas pas phyi dang nang gi dri ma
T02D2684:228b-2: dag par byas te gos sar pa bgos la mdun
T02D2684:228b-3: du bum pa rin po che las grub pa'i nang
T02D2684:228b-4: du srog chags med cing gtsang ba'i chu blugs nas
T02D2684:228b-5: sku'i rtags su sman lnga dang /
T02D2684:228b-6: gsung gi rtags su spos lnga dang /
T02D2684:228b-7: thugs kyi rtags su snying po lnga dang /
T02D2684:228b-8: phrin las kyi rtags su 'bras bu lnga dang /
T02D2684:228b-9: yon tan gyi rtags su rin po che lnga dang /
T02D2684:228b-10: da bzhin nyid la nyes pa'i dri mas ma gos
T02D2684:228b-11: pa'i rtags su mgul gos gtsang mas dgab cing bzhag
T02D2684:228b-12: ste / de'i nang du skad cig ma la bskyed pa'i lha'i sku dang /
T02D2684:228b-16: yon tan rnams mtshon pa'i phyir rdzas de rnams bum par stsol lo //
T02D2684:228b-17: sngags pa bdag nyid kyang yon tan de dag thob par bya ba'o phyir /
T02D2684:228b-18: rtag tu yid la dran ba'i gzungs thag gdags par bya ste /
T02D2684:228b-19: srad bu dkar po gtsang ma la sku gsungs thugs
T02D2684:228b-20: kyi rang bzhin sum sgril du bya ba bzung ste
T02D2684:228b-21: ma yengs par 'di ltar bzlas pa dang bsgom pa
T02D2684:228b-23: gong du brjod pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i sngags
T02D2684:228b-24: pas yud tsam gyis mdun gyi nam mkha' la sangs
T02D2684:228b-25: rgyas sh'akya thub pa stong pa nyid la mnyam par
T02D2684:228b-26: gzhag ba 'ja' tshon lta bur snang la rang bzhin
T02D2684:228b-27: med pa'i sprul sku bzhugs par bsams la /
T02D2684:228b-28: rang nyid yud tsam gyis lag na rdo rjer mos par bya'o //
T02D2684:228b-29: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag lus thams cad
T02D2684:228b-30: rdo rje byin gyis brlab tu gsol zhes lan gsum
T02D2684:228b-32: gsol ba btab pas lus rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs
T02D2684:228b-33: pas stong pa nyid du gyur pa la cung zad
T02D2684:228b-34: gnas par bya'o ; / de nas stong pa'i ngang
T02D2684:228b-35: las rang nyid yud tsam gyis rdo rje rnam 'joms
T02D2684:228b-36: sngon po zhal gcig pa phyag gnyis pa g-yas na
T02D2684:228b-37: rdo rje gdengs pa g-yon na dril bu dku la
T02D2684:228b-38: bu brten nas bzhengs shing 'gying bag bcas pa'i zhal
T02D2684:228b-39: khro zhing mche ba gtsigs pa'i sku 'ja' tshon lta
T02D2684:228b-40: gnas par bya'o ; bur bsams la ; mdun gyi
T02D2684:228b-41: khams gsum rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin bum pa'i
T02D2684:228b-42: nang du yang yud tsam gyis rang dang mthun pa'i
T02D2684:228b-43: sku bskyed la de'i thugs kar gzungs thag gi sna
T02D2684:228b-44: zug par bsams la sngags kyi sgra 'brug lta bur
T02D2684:228b-45: stong gsum gang bar bsam zhing ngag tu gdon par
T02D2684:229a-0: gnas par bya'o ; bur bsams la ; bya'o // sngags kyi phreng ba gzungs @229a * //
T02D2684:229a-1: thag la 'khril zhing bum bar lha'i thugs kar phog par bsam par bya'o //
T02D2684:229a-2: grangs ni thun re la brgya rtsa brgyang la sogs
T02D2684:229a-3: pa ci nus su bzlas nas de'i rjes la bstod
T02D2684:229a-5: rdo rje ye shes nyon mongs 'joms pa'i sku //
T02D2684:229a-6: thugs rje byams pas ma rig sel ba'i gsung /
T02D2684:229a-7: bde chen mi g-yo mchog tu gsal ba'i thugs //
T02D2684:229a-8: rdo rje rnam par 'joms la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D2684:229a-9: ces bstod pa zin pa dang lha 'od du zhu
T02D2684:229a-10: ste ye shes kyi bdud rtsir bsams la bdag dang
T02D2684:229a-11: gzhan la khrus bya zhing sngags kyi mthar phrin las
T02D2684:229a-12: kyi spel ba dang bcas par bzla'o /
T02D2684:229a-13: de ni phyi'i khrus te lus dag pa phung po
T02D2684:229a-14: lhag ma med pa'i nyan thos kyi 'bras bu thob
T02D2684:229a-15: par gyur ro // de nas nang gi khrus bshad par bya'o //
T02D2684:229a-16: bum pa ni rang gi lus te khams gsum rnam par dag pa'i gzhal yas khang ngo //
T02D2684:229a-17: rdzas ni don snying rnam lnga dang /
T02D2684:229a-19: phung po lnga dang dbang po lnga dang /
T02D2684:229a-20: 'byung ba bzhi la rim pa bzhin du /
T02D2684:229a-25: rin po zhe rnams su mongs bar byas la snying
T02D2684:229a-26: gar yud tsam gyis lha bskyed pa'i bar du gsol
T02D2684:229a-27: ba gdab pa la sogs bsdam bzhin no //
T02D2684:229a-28: rang nyid zas dkar gsum la sogs pa gtsang ma zos pa ni chu'o ;
T02D2684:229a-29: / gos gtsang ma gyon pa ni mgul chings so //
T02D2684:229a-30: dran ba ma yengs pa ni gzungs thag go //
T02D2684:229a-31: sngags ni sgra mi che bar bzlas par bya ste rig sngags zhes bya'o //
T02D2684:229a-32: zin pa dang snying ga'i lha la sogs pa zhu
T02D2684:229a-33: nas rdo rje nor bu nas byung ba'i rang 'byung
T02D2684:229a-34: gi bdud rtsis bkru bar bya'o //
T02D2684:229a-36: des ni phyi yul la rgyu ba bkag pas chos
T02D2684:229a-37: kyi bdag gzung ba'i phyogs gcig la bdag med pa
T02D2684:229a-38: rtogs pas ngag dag pa sngags kyi nus pa thob
T02D2684:229a-39: nas rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu mi dma' ba
T02D2684:229a-41: de nas gsang ba'i khrus brjod par bya'o //
T02D2684:229a-42: gsol ba gdab pa la sogs pa snga ma ltar
T02D2684:229a-43: byas nas thams cad sems kyi rang bzhin yin no
T02D2684:229a-44: zhes lhag par mos par byas la /
T02D2684:229a-45: sems de'i rang bzhin ni 'od gsal ba yin mod
T02D2684:229a-46: kyi gnas skabs nyon mongs pas bsgribs pa de gsal
T02D2684:229a-47: ba'i don du sems de lus ngag yid gsum gyi
T02D2684:229b-0: rnam pa yi ge aom a'a: h'um @229b * //
T02D2684:229b-1: gsum du bsams la yi ge gsum las sngags kyang
T02D2684:229b-2: gsang sngags kyi tshul du lan bdun yid kyis brjod
T02D2684:229b-3: de yi ge gsum po rim gyis aom dang a'a:dang
T02D2684:229b-4: h'um la 'dus te h'um de yang n'a da'i bar
T02D2684:229b-5: du thim ste / n'a da de mar me ltar
T02D2684:229b-6: rab tu gsal bar 'gyur bas ni sems kyi sgrib
T02D2684:229b-7: pa dag par byas nas sems yongs su dag pa
T02D2684:229b-8: sems tsam gyi 'bras bu thob ste gsang ba'i khrus
T02D2684:229b-9: du thim ste / zhes bya'o // ldang bar 'dod
T02D2684:229b-10: na lus sems ngag yid gsum sku gsung thugs kyi
T02D2684:229b-11: rang bzhin du dbyer med pa la mos pas spyod
T02D2684:229b-12: du thim ste / zhes bya'o // lam bya'o //
T02D2684:229b-13: da ni de kho na nyid kyi khrus brjod par
T02D2684:229b-14: du thim ste / zhes bya'o // lam bya'o //
T02D2684:229b-15: bya'o // chos thams cad sems su lhag par mos
T02D2684:229b-16: par sems nyid yi ge gsum du bsams la sku
T02D2684:229b-17: gsum du mos pa bya bzhin khams gsum pa rnams
T02D2684:229b-18: kyang yi ge gsum las byung zhing de la slar
T02D2684:229b-19: thim par gyur pa'o zhes mos par bya'o //
T02D2684:229b-20: de nas yi ge aom ni a'a: la thim pas
T02D2684:229b-21: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i rang bzhi na ngag gi
T02D2684:229b-22: sgyu ma lta bur mi bden zhes mos pa bya'o
T02D2684:229b-23: // de ma thag tu h'um yang a'a:la thim pas
T02D2684:229b-24: sprul ba'i sku'i rang bzhin lus kyang sgyu ma lta
T02D2684:229b-25: // bu ste / yang dag par ma grub ces
T02D2684:229b-26: bsams zhing de ma thag tu yi ge a'a:de yang
T02D2684:229b-28: dag tu yang a'a:zhes bya ba nyi shu rtsa gcig
T02D2684:229b-29: brjod pa ni snying po'i tshul du sngags bzlas pa'o
T02D2684:229b-30: // de ltar brjod pas brjod yal du gyur te
T02D2684:229b-31: de nas a'a:la sems gsal bar gtad pas sems nyid
T02D2684:229b-32: rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa rkyen gyis mi 'gag
T02D2684:229b-33: pa'i chos nyid brjod du med pa rang du gnas
T02D2684:229b-34: // te / a'a'i ming tsam yang mi dmigs pa
T02D2684:229b-35: ni rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin te nam
T02D2684:229b-36: mkha' lta bu zag pa med pa'i bde ba dang
T02D2684:229b-37: spros pa med pa'i chos nyid ro gcig tu gyur
T02D2684:229b-38: pa brjod du med pa'i ye shes kyi ngal ji
T02D2684:229b-40: de ni rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin yin
T02D2684:229b-41: pas na rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
T02D2684:229b-42: zhugs so zhes kyang gsungs so //
T02D2684:229b-43: de ni de kho na nyid kyi khrus te sko
T02D2684:229b-44: gsum dag pa dbyer med pa dbu ma'i lam mthar
T02D2684:229b-45: phyin pa'i chos kyi sku thob pa zhes bya'o //
T02D2684:229b-46: ting nge 'dzin las ldang bar 'dod na yang skad
T02D2684:229b-47: cig las khas gsum pa'i ngo bo aa las skur
T02D2684:229b-48: mos ba bya ste spyod lam bya'o //
T02D2684:230a-0: ting nge 'dzin de'i che ba ni de nas zhes bya ba nas rab tu smras so @230a * //
T02D2684:230a-1: zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs so //
T02D2684:230a-2: de ltar na gdams ngag gi don brjod pa'o //
T02D2684:230a-3: da ni yi ge'i don brjod par bya ste /
T02D2684:230a-4: de la dang por re zhig nges pa'i don bshad par bya'o //
T02D2684:230a-5: de nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i mthus
T02D2684:230a-6: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rtogs bar sla'o
T02D2684:230a-7: // rdo rje zhes bya ba ni stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin to //
T02D2684:230a-8: gal te de ni khro bar mi 'thad do zhe
T02D2684:230a-9: na spros pa dang mtshan ma la sogs pa 'khor
T02D2684:230a-10: ba'i chos thams cad la stong pa nyid de khro
T02D2684:230a-11: zhing gtum la de dag 'joms pa na de'i phyir
T02D2684:230a-12: de la khro bo zhes gsungs so //
T02D2684:230a-13: chos thams cad stong pa nyid chos nyid skye ba
T02D2684:230a-14: med pa'i ngang las byung bas na rdo rje khro
T02D2684:230a-15: po las byung ba zhes gsungs so //
T02D2684:230a-16: gang 'byung zhe na rdo rje snying po ste /
T02D2684:230a-17: thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i khyad par gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2684:230a-18: 'dir bsdus pa'i don ni 'di yin te 'khor ba
T02D2684:230a-19: dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i dongs bo thams cad
T02D2684:230a-20: ni rgyud do cog gi rtsa bar rang gi sems
T02D2684:230a-21: las byung la / sems de yang shin tu rtogs
T02D2684:230a-22: par dka' bas so so skye bo nas byung chub
T02D2684:230a-23: sems dpa' la sogs pa'i bar du rtogs pa'i bye
T02D2684:230a-24: brag tha dad pa sna tshogs 'byung ngo //
T02D2684:230a-25: de yang dmus long gis rta dang glang po la
T02D2684:230a-26: dpyad pa bzhin du de dag gis kyang cha shas
T02D2684:230a-27: kyang rtsam la / rang rang gi grub mtha' dang
T02D2684:230a-28: lta bar 'dogs pas zad de grub mtha' tha dad
T02D2684:230a-29: kyang sems nyid de bzhin nyid la ni tha dad
T02D2684:230a-30: pa'am rnam par dbye ba yod pa ma yin te
T02D2684:230a-31: kyang rtsam la / ji skad du / chos kyi dbyings la dbyer med phyir //
T02D2684:230a-32: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2684:230a-33: sems de yang rgyud do cog gi rtsa ba ji
T02D2684:230a-34: ltar yin zhe na lung las chos thams cad sems
T02D2684:230a-35: kyi sprul pa'o // zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i lung dang rigs pa mang mod kyi /
T02D2684:230a-36: 'dir ni bla ma'i gdams ngag la gtso bo yin no //
T02D2684:230a-37: gal te gdams pa ltar na yang sems ci'i phyir
T02D2684:230a-38: na rgyud do cog gi rtsa ba yin snyam pa
T02D2684:230a-39: la / chos thams cad ni sems su 'dus la
T02D2684:230a-40: sems kyi rang bzhin legs par ma rtogs bas 'khor
T02D2684:230a-41: ba'i rgya mtsho yang byung la /
T02D2684:230a-42: rtogs shing goms pas mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde
T02D2684:230a-43: ba yang byung ba'i phyir sems ni rgyud do cog
T02D2684:230a-45: ma rtogs pa las 'khor ba ji ltar 'byung zhe na /
T02D2684:230a-46: ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'khor ba zhes bya ba ste /
T02D2684:230b-4: sems de legs par rtogs shing bsgrub pa las mya
T02D2684:230b-5: ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba ji ltar 'byung zhe
T02D2684:230b-6: na / rang byung gi ye shes chen po'i rkyen gyis mya ngan 'das pa zhes bya ba ste /
T02D2684:230b-7: rgyu dang rkyen dang rang bzhin dang dbye ba'o //
T02D2684:230b-8: de dag zhib tu bla ma'i lung las shes par bya'o //
T02D2684:230b-9: de ltar na rdo rje khro bo las byung ba'i
T02D2684:230b-10: rdo rje snying po sems kyi de bzhin nyid de
T02D2684:230b-11: las rgyun du gnas shing brtan pa thob pas ni
T02D2684:230b-12: rnam par rtog pas bar du mi tshod pa zhes
T02D2684:230b-14: 'dus ma byas par lhun gyis grub pa'i rdo rje
T02D2684:230b-15: lta bu'i sku yin pa'i phyir rkyen gyis mi shigs
T02D2684:230b-16: pa'o // yang dag ba'i don la slu ba med pas na bden pa'o //
T02D2684:230b-17: don na rtogs pa dang thog par dka' bas na sra ba'o //
T02D2684:230b-18: rdo rje snying po de ngan song du gnas pa'i
T02D2684:230b-19: tshe dman par mi 'gyur la nya ngan las 'das
T02D2684:230b-20: pa'i dus na bzang bar mi 'gyur bas na brtan
T02D2684:230b-21: pa'o // gang gi rdo rje snying po de rtogs
T02D2684:230b-22: pas nam mkha' ltar ci'i ngo bor yang ma grub
T02D2684:230b-23: bas na thogs pa med pa'o //
T02D2684:230b-24: stong pa nyid nam mkha' lta bu de la gang
T02D2684:230b-25: gis kyang mi tshugs shing glags mi rnyed pas na
T02D2684:230b-26: thams cad du ma pham pa'o //
T02D2684:230b-27: rdo rje gnas bdun po des ci phal cher bdag gi don yul chos ki dbyings bstan to //
T02D2684:230b-28: da ni phal cher gzhan gyi don gyi dbang du
T02D2684:230b-29: mdzad nas ye shes kyi khyad par gsungs ba ni
T02D2684:230b-30: sems can thams cad skrag par byed pa zhes bya
T02D2684:230b-31: ba la sogs pa phrin las bco brgyad ni drang
T02D2684:230b-32: ba'i don ltar na 'khrul 'khor bris te sgra ji
T02D2684:230b-34: 'dir nges pa'i don ltar na bco brgyad po de
T02D2684:230b-35: ni lam gyi rim pas ni stong pa nyid bco
T02D2684:230b-36: brgyad yin zhing 'bras bu'i dus na ni sangs rgyas
T02D2684:230b-37: kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad du rig par
T02D2684:230b-38: bya'o // de la sems ni rang rig pa de lus la brten pas na sems can no //
T02D2684:230b-39: thams cad ni ji snyed pa ma lus pa'o //
T02D2684:230b-40: skrag par byed ces bya ba ni stong ba nyid
T02D2684:230b-41: kyi ye shes kyi mes rang gi sems kyi nyon
T02D2684:230b-43: sems can ni sngar bzhin no //
T02D2684:230b-44: 'jil ba ni nyon mongs pa mngon du rgyu ba rnams so //
T02D2684:230b-45: rig sngags ni phyi'i yul rnams so //
T02D2684:230b-46: gcod pa ni sems las gzhan pa'i don ma grub par rtogs pa'o //
T02D2684:231a-0: rig sngags ni snga ma bzhin te gnon pa'i yul la @231a * //
T02D2684:231a-2: las ni 'bad ba dang rtsol ba'o //
T02D2684:231a-3: stong pa nyid la 'bad cing sgrub pa'i las byed pas na 'joms ba'o //
T02D2684:231a-4: da ltar ba gzhan pa'i las sngon gyi las so //
T02D2684:231a-5: 'jig pa ni zad cing zhi bar byed pa'o //
T02D2684:231a-6: gdon ni rnam par rtog ba'o //
T02D2684:231a-7: thams cad ni bzang ngan la sogs pa'o //
T02D2684:231a-8: brlag pa ni don rtogs pas rang bzhin gyur ba'o //
T02D2684:231a-9: gdon ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02D2684:231a-10: thar pa ni slar mi skye ba skye ste gtan sbangs pa'o //
T02D2684:231a-11: 'byung po ni dbugs rgyu rlung la sogs pa 'byung ba bzhi'o //
T02D2684:231a-12: 'gugs pa ni rlung la sogs ba ste stong pa'i
T02D2684:231a-13: ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa'i stobs kyis rang bzhin
T02D2684:231a-14: gyi rgyu ba chad de bstan pa'o //
T02D2684:231a-16: las thams cad ni snang bar bsgyur ba ste 'byung ba la dbang thob pas so //
T02D2684:231a-17: ma grub pa ni ting nge 'dzin mi gsal ba'o //
T02D2684:231a-18: grub bar byed pa ni de kho na nyid la
T02D2684:231a-19: sogs pa'i khrus kyis de bzhin nyid gsal zhing brtan
T02D2684:231a-20: pa'o // grub pa ni ting nge 'dzin nyid do //
T02D2684:231a-21: chud mi za ba ni slar mi nyams pa'o //
T02D2684:231a-22: chos sku las gzugs skur 'char zhing des yid la
T02D2684:231a-23: bsams pa ltar phan 'dogs pas na 'dod pa thams
T02D2684:231a-25: ting nge 'dzin de las sangs rgyas kyi chos thams
T02D2684:231a-26: cad 'byung bas na 'dod pa thams cad sbyin pa'o
T02D2684:231a-28: srung ba ni 'khor ba las so //
T02D2684:231a-29: ji ltar srung zhe na nyon mongs pa bzhi dang //
T02D2684:231a-30: rjes su mthun pa'i phrin las bzhes so //
T02D2684:231a-31: gang zhe na 'dod chags can dang zhe sdang can dang /
T02D2684:231a-32: gti mug can dang cha mnyam pa la zhi ba dang /
T02D2684:231a-33: mngon spyod dang dbang dang rgyas pa rnams go rims ltar sbyar ro ;
T02D2684:231a-34: / rengs par byed pa ni zhe sdang can la'o //
T02D2684:231a-35: rmugs par byed pa ni gti mug can la'o //
T02D2684:231a-36: gzhan yang zhi ba ni de bzhin nyid dang chos kyi dbyings so //
T02D2684:231a-37: rgyas pa la ni mngon du gyur pa'i chos kyi sku'o //
T02D2684:231a-38: rengs pa ni mngon spyod de bde ba chen po
T02D2684:231a-39: la mngon par longs spyod pas na longs spyod rdzogs
T02D2684:231a-40: pa'i sku'o// rmugs pa ni ye shes la sogs ba mi mnga' ba'i phyir sprul skur rig par bya'o //
T02D2684:231a-41: zhi ba ni thabs gang gis sems can gyi rgyu ba rags pa rnams zhi nas gnas ba'o //
T02D2684:231a-42: rgyas ba ni de las lhag pa'i myong ba mthong ba'am rtogs pa'o //
T02D2684:231a-43: rengs pa ni zhi bar gnas shing lhag pas mthong
T02D2684:231b-0: bas sems @231b nyid myong bar mi 'gyur bas de'i
T02D2684:231b-2: de'i ngang la gnas na dmigs pa'i yul ci yang
T02D2684:231b-3: ma grub cing mthong ba'am rtogs pa'am bye brag phyed
T02D2684:231b-4: pa'i dngos bor 'gyur ba ci 'ang med ba'i phyir
T02D2684:231b-6: stong pa nyid kyi ngang la gnas pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2684:231b-7: gsang sngags kyi mthu chen po zhes bya ba ni
T02D2684:231b-8: sngar brjod pa'i stong pa nyid chos thams cad kyi
T02D2684:231b-9: rang bzhin te de ni ngo bo nyid kyis gsang
T02D2684:231b-10: ba'am sbas pa lta bur gnas shing rtogs par dka'
T02D2684:231b-12: de'i mthu ni chos nyid bden pa'i nus ba'o //
T02D2684:231b-13: chen po ni dngos po dang mtshan ma'i tshogs chen
T02D2684:231b-14: po yang 'joms la mtshan mas slar gzhom pa'am glags
T02D2684:231b-16: ji ltar nyi mas mun pa 'joms kyi mun pa de ltar ma yin pa bzhin no //
T02D2684:231b-17: rab tu smras zhes bya ba ni don zab mo
T02D2684:231b-18: rtogs pa'i yan lag tu re shig tshig dang yi
T02D2684:231b-20: rdo rje snying po'am yang dag pa'i don la ni
T02D2684:231b-21: smra ba'am bstan par mi nus te rang rig pa'i
T02D2684:231b-22: ye shes kyi ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2684:231b-23: na mo ratna tra y'a ya zhes bya ba la
T02D2684:231b-24: sogs pa'i gsang sngags kyi don ni byin gyi rlabs
T02D2684:231b-25: chung bar 'gyur bas na ma phye'o //
T02D2684:231b-26: de ltar bstan pa'i don des cir 'gyur zhe na /
T02D2684:231b-27: rgyud do cog gi rtsa ba ma rig pa la
T02D2684:231b-28: sogs pa'i nyes pa rnams zhi nas nyes pa'i 'bras
T02D2684:231b-29: bu sdug bsngal thams cad mi 'byung ste de la
T02D2684:231b-30: dgongs nas / sdug pa thams cad byang byas nas //
T02D2684:231b-31: sdug bsngal thams cad med par byed /
T02D2684:231b-33: 'di skad du gsungs pa yin te gang zhig skye
T02D2684:231b-34: ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal 'di dag ni sngon
T02D2684:231b-35: rang rang gi sdig pa mi dge ba spyad pa
T02D2684:231b-36: las byung bas te sdig pa mi dge ba'i las
T02D2684:231b-37: de yang sems la gnas bas na gang gis sems
T02D2684:231b-38: kyi rang bzhin 'od gsal ba rtogs pa de'i tshe
T02D2684:231b-39: bag chags kyi dri ma dag pas sdig pa thams
T02D2684:231b-40: cad dag par gyur nas de'i 'bras bu las kyi
T02D2684:231b-41: rnam smin sdug bsngal la sogs pa myong bar 'gyur
T02D2684:231b-42: ba thams cad kyang med par byed do zhes bstan
T02D2684:231b-43: par 'gyur ro // da ni 'jig rten dang 'jig
T02D2684:231b-44: rten las 'das pa'i 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa
T02D2684:231b-45: par 'gyur ro // ston te / 'dir gsang sngags
T02D2684:231b-46: kyi 'bras bu nyan thos la sogs pa phung po
T02D2684:231b-47: lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa tho
T02D2684:231b-48: rangs kyi mar me shi ba ltar mi 'dod bas
T02D2684:231b-49: yon tan gyi dbang du mdzad de /
T02D2684:232a-3: des ni nges pa'i don rnams bshad zin to //
T02D2684:232a-4: da ni drang ba'i don brjod par bya ste /
T02D2684:232a-5: de la phrin las kyi bye brag bco brgyad do //
T02D2684:232a-6: mdor bsdus na phrin las bzhi'o //
T02D2684:232a-7: de la lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas las 'di
T02D2684:232a-8: dag bsgrub par bya'i stong pa nyid kyis ma yin
T02D2684:232a-9: no // de yang tshes gsum dang ldan pa'i sngags
T02D2684:232a-10: pas 'grub par rje btsun gsungs te de gang zhe
T02D2684:232a-11: na rtogs pa'i gdengs dang ldan pa dang lha las
T02D2684:232a-14: de lta bu'i sngags pas sgrub pa ni snying brtse
T02D2684:232a-15: ba sngon du 'grongs bya'i gzhan du na dam tshig
T02D2684:232a-17: de la dang por las bco brgyad la phrin las
T02D2684:232a-18: bzhi'i 'khrul 'khor bri bar bya ste 'khrul 'khor gyi
T02D2684:232a-19: rgyu dang dus dang kha dog dang dbyibs so //
T02D2684:232a-20: de la zhi ba'i 'khrul 'khor ni rgyu ras la
T02D2684:232a-21: sogs pa la'o ma dang tsandan la sogs pas so
T02D2684:232a-24: dbyibs zlum po ste padma rgyas pa lta bu'o //
T02D2684:232a-25: rgyas pa'i 'khrul 'khor ni rgyu shing shun la sogs pa la gi wang la sogs pas so //
T02D2684:232a-29: dbang gi rgyu ni ras sam shing shun la mtshal dang li khri la sogs pas so //
T02D2684:232a-33: mngon spyod kyi rgyu ni ro ras sam zhing chen la dug dang khrag gis bris pa'o //
T02D2684:232a-34: dus ni dgra la mtshan phyed na'o //
T02D2684:232a-36: dbyibs dang kha dog ni nag po gru gsum mo //
T02D2684:232a-37: sngags dang ting nge 'dzin ni lung las shes par bya'o //
T02D2684:232a-38: sems can ni gang yang rung ba'o ;
T02D2684:232a-39: / dbang po ni rnam par shes pa skye ba'i rten mig la sogs pa'o //
T02D2684:232a-40: nyams pa ni mi gsal ba'am dman bar gyur pa'o //
T02D2684:232a-41: 'og nas gnod pa dang zhes bya ba thams cad
T02D2684:232a-42: la sbyar te dbang po nyams pa'i gnod pa dang
T02D2684:232a-44: gnod pa de dag khrus bzhi po sngar bstan pa la gnas pas zhi bar zhes rig par bya'o //
T02D2684:232a-45: tshul ji ltar gnas pas zhe na sgrub pa po
T02D2684:232a-46: gang dag yid dge ba ni kun la phan par
T02D2684:232a-47: 'dod pas so // sems dang ba ni chos la gus pa dang spros pas so //
T02D2684:232a-48: dam tshig dang sdom pa ma nyams pa ni gtsang ma'i gos kyis rab brgyan te //
T02D2684:232b-0: mnyan par bya @232b zhes 'brel te gang zhe na mdo sde dam pa'o //
T02D2684:232b-2: zab mo sangs rgyas spyod yul ba'o //
T02D2684:232b-3: 'di ni slob dpon la lung blangs pa las 'bras
T02D2684:232b-4: bu 'thob kyi rang dgas ni ma yin zhes dgongs
T02D2684:232b-5: pa'o // chos rnams kyi de kho na nyid mdor bsdus te gsungs pas na mdo sde'o //
T02D2684:232b-6: de la nyan cing rjes su bsgrubs pas gnas skabs kyi 'bras bu yang /
T02D2684:232b-7: mdo sde 'di yi gzi brjid kyis //
T02D2684:232b-8: srog chags dag ni thams cad kyi //
T02D2684:232b-9: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2684:232b-10: thams cad kyi nad zhi zhes bya ba ni gang dag nyams su len pa rnams kyi'o //
T02D2684:232b-11: drang ba'i don bshad zin to //
T02D2684:232b-12: da ni rdzas dang sngags kyi grangs gsungs pa ni /
T02D2684:232b-13: nor bu yungs kar d'ur ba dang //
T02D2684:232b-14: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste nor bu zhes
T02D2684:232b-15: bya ba ni mu tig la sogs pa rin po
T02D2684:232b-17: yungs kar zhes bya ba ni 'bru lnga'i brda'o //
T02D2684:232b-18: d'ur ba zhes bya ba ni snying po lnga'o /
T02D2684:232b-19: rma med pa ni nyams pa ste tsandan gang la
T02D2684:232b-20: ma nyams ba'i dri yod pa de ni dkon zhing
T02D2684:232b-21: dri'i mchog ste spos lnga'i mtshon pa'o //
T02D2684:232b-22: bcas zhes bya ba ni dri de ma rnyed na
T02D2684:232b-23: dri gzhan yang rung zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go
T02D2684:232b-24: // rin chen zhes bya ba ni sman lnga'i brda'o //
T02D2684:232b-25: sman la sogs pa lnga po de dag ci'i don du bum par gzhug ce na /
T02D2684:232b-26: zag bcas kyi phung po lnga dang /
T02D2684:232b-27: sa la sogs pa'i khams lnga dang rol sogs pa'i yul lnga dang /
T02D2684:232b-28: 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa lnga rnams
T02D2684:232b-29: yongs su dag nas zag pa med pa'i phung po
T02D2684:232b-30: lnga dang ye shes lnga dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i
T02D2684:232b-34: yon tan de dag gi don rtogs shing thob par bya ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2684:232b-35: rin po che lnga la sogs pa dbul pos mi
T02D2684:232b-36: 'byor ro snyam pa la sku gsung thugs kyi mtshon
T02D2684:232b-37: byed du rdzas gsum gsungs te /
T02D2684:232b-38: shel dang rdo rje me tog gam //
T02D2684:232b-39: zhes bya ba ni gzhan mi rnyed na zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2684:232b-40: de ni lus dang ngag dang yid yongs su dag
T02D2684:232b-41: pa'i rang bzhin sku gsum thob pa'o zhes mtshon pa
T02D2684:232b-42: ste sgo gsum dag pa las sku gsum 'byung ba
T02D2684:232b-43: yang sems dag cing dri ma med pa shel lta
T02D2684:232b-45: rdo rje lta bu rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang /
T02D2684:232b-46: 'gro ba thams cad la yid du 'ong zhing mdzes
T02D2684:232b-47: pa'i me tog lta bu sprul pa'i sku ste de
T02D2684:233a-1: mchog tu dbul bas gsum mi 'byor ro zhe na de'i phyir /
T02D2684:233a-2: chu yi gser ram yang na ni //
T02D2684:233a-4: de tsam la brten zhes pa'o //
T02D2684:233a-5: de la gser ni bsregs pa la sogs pas rang
T02D2684:233a-6: bzhin ser po bsgyur bar mi nus pa bzhin du
T02D2684:233a-7: byang chub kyi snying po yang de de ltar mtshon
T02D2684:233a-8: ba'i brda'o // ram yang na ni zhes bya ba
T02D2684:233a-9: de dag gang yang mi rnyed pas bum pa rin
T02D2684:233a-10: po che las grub tsam la brten zhes bya ba'i
T02D2684:233a-11: ba'i brda'o // don to // gang zhe na /
T02D2684:233a-12: dngul gyi bum pa dag kyang rung //
T02D2684:233a-14: kyang zhes bya ba ni sa la sogs pa'i snod mtshon pa'o //
T02D2684:233a-15: 'dir rtogs par bya ba ni 'di yin te dngul
T02D2684:233a-16: gyi bum pa ni dkar zhing dri ma med pa
T02D2684:233a-17: dang rin po che yin zhing mnyen pa ltar byang
T02D2684:233a-18: chub kyi sems 'gro ba kun la khyab pa'i don
T02D2684:233a-19: gyi snying po de kho na nyid kyang rnal 'byor
T02D2684:233a-20: ba gang gis mngon du byas nas ma rig pa'i
T02D2684:233a-21: mun pa zhi ba dang nyon mongs pa'i dri ma
T02D2684:233a-22: dag ba dang rin po che bzhin du 'dod pa
T02D2684:233a-23: thams cad 'byung ba dang lam gyi dus na lus
T02D2684:233a-24: dang sems mnyen zhing las su rung ba ste /
T02D2684:233a-25: de ltar dngul dang byang chub kyi sems chos mtshungs pa'o //
T02D2684:233a-26: zhes gsungs par rig par bya'o //
T02D2684:233a-27: gtsang ma'i gos kyis zhes bya ba ji ltar gos
T02D2684:233a-28: kyis lhags pa dang ngo tshal sogs pa las skyob
T02D2684:233a-29: pa bzhin du / rnal 'byor pa'i dam tshig dang
T02D2684:233a-30: sdom pa yang 'khor ba dang ngan song las skyob
T02D2684:233a-31: pa'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D2684:233a-32: gtsang ma'i zhes bya ba ni dam tshig la sogs
T02D2684:233a-33: ba'i skyon med de ma nyams pa'o zhes rig par
T02D2684:233a-34: bya'o // bzlas pa'i dbang du mdzad de thun re
T02D2684:233a-35: re la gzungs ring po nyi shu rtsa gcig gam
T02D2684:233a-37: yang snying bzlas par 'dod na brgya rtsa brgyad yan chad do zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2684:233a-38: rgyal po ni sems te bag chags kun gyi gzhi
T02D2684:233a-39: yin la brtan pas rgyal po dang chos mtshungs so
T02D2684:233a-40: // de khrus byas pas sgrib pa thams cad dang
T02D2684:233a-41: bral nas ma bcos pa gnyug ma'i ngang la gnas
T02D2684:233a-43: blon po lta bu nyon mongs pa yid dang 'bangs
T02D2684:233a-44: lta bu'i tshogs drug kyang rgyal po ni zhi bas
T02D2684:233a-46: de lta bas na gang zhig 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal
T02D2684:233a-47: las thar par 'dod pas sems kyi rgyal po rtag
T02D2684:233a-48: tu khrus kyis shig ces gsungs so //
T02D2684:233a-49: rdo rje spun dang dam tshig 'di la mos //
T02D2684:233b-0: de yi ngor byas @233b bla ma dam pa'i gsung //
T02D2684:233b-1: shes rab mthu yis bdag gis rnam par bkod //
T02D2684:233b-2: dge ba thob de byang chub mchog tu bsngo //
T02D2684:233b-3: nyes par gyur na rnam 'joms nying la bshags //
T02D2684:233b-4: rdo rje rnam 'joms kyi 'grel ba jo bo smri tis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D2684:233b-6: // / pandi ta chen bo de nyid kyis bsgyur /
T02D2684:233b-7: phyi dang nang dang de kho na nyid kyi khrus
